column1: NGR is from the 1950s record, which is just south of the reservoir and definitely in Monmouthshire. In 1941 the station was renumbered from 4175 and correctly placed in Monmouthshire, note the Jan 1941 results are the same where they coincide. The station appears to have moved around in this general area 120 yards south in 1941 and there is a note that the gauge was submerged in 1911, with a gap in 1912 but there is no note of the where the gauge moved to or from.
Jan 1940 estimated for snow; reading left in this record
